HotelElement.Name: Isle of Palms Resort Gold Coast

Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Isle of Palms Resort in Elanora, you'll be on a lake and convenient to Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary and Surf World Gold Coast. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Currumbin Beach and Tugun Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or 2 spa tubs and enjoy other recreational amenities, which include outdoor tennis courts. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and luggage storage. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.
